job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Data scientists at Disney Streaming Services are the insights and modeling partners for the content marketing product and engineering teams at Disney Hulu and ESPN They use data to empower decisionmakers with information predictions and insights that ultimately influence the experiences of millions of users worldwide Scientists on the team build models perform statistical analysis and create visualizations to provide scalable persistent capability that is iteratively improved through direct interaction with crossfunctional business partnersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtModeling Develop machine learning models for forecasting opportunity sizing and segmentationltligtltligtDeep analysis Analyze user behavioral data to identify patterns uncover opportunities and create common understanding of how people are interacting with the service and contentltligtltligtVisualization of Complex Data sets Development of prototype solutions mathematical models algorithms and robust analytics leading to actionable insights communicated clearly and visuallyltligtltligtPartnership Partner closely with business stakeholders to identify and unlock opportunities and with other data teams to improve platform capabilities around data modeling data visualization experimentation and data architectureltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat To Bringltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of handson experience designing building and evaluating practical machine learning solutions to solve business problemsltligtltligt5 years experience with statistical programming language Python or Rltligtltligt3 years experience using SQLltligtltligtDeep understanding of machine learning concepts and statistical methodsltligtltligtStrong communication skills for both technical and nontechnical audiencesltligtltligtAdvanced degree PhD or MS in an analytical field or equivalent
